Description: Up for grabs is a Charvel CX390 with a Floyd Rose . This model was made between 92'-96'. This is the higher end model with the Floyd Rose trem. These guitars were $750.00 back in the day. Some of these models are selling for $400.00 plus. I am simply trying to find a better home for her. Everything functions 100% flawlessly. I do not set up guitar with new strings, or adjust the trem, bridge, etc. I will pack and ship this guitar professionally with proper tracking and insurance. If you win the auction, be prepared to pay within 48 hours of winning the auction. If you foresee that you can't pay on time, please email me BEFORE the auction ends, not after. I have listed the specs below. Please message me with any questions, or concerns you may have. Please feel free to check out my other items for sale. Thank you for looking, happy bidding, and good luck!
